column4: Today (2025-Jan-30) is Anthestēriṓn 1, νουμηνίᾳ Ἀνθεστηριῶνος, day 209 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.
This Anthestēriṓn will have 30 days, which the ancient Greeks called a “full month” (πλήρης μήν) as opposed to a “hollow month” (κοῖλος μήν) of 29.

Festivals in Anthestēriṓn:

11–13: Anthesteria (Ἀνθεστήρια)
23: Diasia (Διάσια)

Today (2025-Mar-01) is Elaphēboliṓn 1, νουμηνίᾳ Ἑλαφηβολιῶνος, day 239 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.
This Elaphēboliṓn will have 29 days, which the ancient Greeks called a “hollow month” (κοῖλος μήν) as opposed to a “full month” (πλήρης μήν) of 30.

Festivals in Elaphēboliṓn:

8: Proagon (προαγών)
10–16: City Dionysia (Διονύσια τὰ ἐν Ἄστει)
17: Pandia (Πάνδια)

Today (2025-Mar-30) is Mounukhiṓn 1, νουμηνίᾳ Μουνυχιῶνος, day 268 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.
This Mounukhiṓn will have 29 days, which the ancient Greeks called a “hollow month” (κοῖλος μήν) as opposed to a “full month” (πλήρης μήν) of 30.

Festivals in Mounukhiṓn:

6: Delphinia (Δελφίνια)
16: Mounikhia (Μουνίχια)
19: Olympieia (Ὀλυμπίεια)
